CustomField.description: Captures the Close Amount of the most recently received Opportunity. For soft credited gifts, the amount is from the Partial Soft Credit object. If there are multiple qualifying gifts, the largest one wins. Excludes Planned Gifts. Calculated externally by IT Data team and pushed into Salesforce nightly after qualifying changes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Close Amount of the most recently received Opportunity where the Account has a hard or soft credit (excludes Planned Gifts).
CustomField.label: MRC Amount
